alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FLAGLER...ST. JOHNS...NORTHEASTERN MARION...NORTHEASTERN PUTNAM AND CENTRAL CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 724 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Flagler Beach to near Palm Coast to near Palatka to 6 miles east of Orange Springs. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Hastings, East Palatka, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Vilano Beach, and Florahome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
